content: crochet egg pincushion by penny peberdy © 4 ply white yarn 3 00mm hook make a circle and work 12 half_double_crochet into it join to first st cont in rounds making 2ch for height but this does not count as a stitch round 2 work 2 half_double_crochet into each stitch rounds 3 & 4 work 1htr into each st round 5 increase in every 3rd st work 4 rounds straight work 3 half_double_crochet decrease 1 to end work 1 round straight decrease 1 all round stuff firmly break off yarn leaving a long thread for making up thread needle with the yarn and run through the circle left pull up and fasten_off by sewing a few sts this will be the end that goes in the eggcup
